title: Sylas and Form Change Ults
body:
Just played a game as Sylas and laned into a Jayce. I didn't think my ult would yield me nothing.

Sylas will be able to gain Ranged Jayces Abilities.

Sylas Ult does specifically state it converts ad abilities into ap.

NOT FORM CHANGE!

As Sylas, if you ult Jayce. You do damage scaling based on your AD.
I didn't feel weaker in any lane than that one.
